docs.lead_paragraph: EXPECTING ADAM A True Story of Birth, Rebirth, and Everyday Magic. By Martha Beck. 328 pp. New York: Times Books/Random House. $23.95.
docs.abstract: Susan Cheever reviews book Expecting Adam: A True Story of Birth, Rebirth, and Everyday Magic by Martha Beck; drawing (M)
docs.snippet: EXPECTING ADAM   A True Story of Birth, Rebirth,   and Everyday Magic.   By Martha Beck.   328 pp. New York:   Times Books/Random House. $23.95.

docs.lead_paragraph: AFRICA BURUNDI: CONVICTIONS IN PRESIDENT'S DEATH -- The Supreme Court condemned 5 people to death and convicted 23 others for the killing of Melchior Ndadaye, Burundi's first democratically elected President, in 1993. Mr. Ndadaye, a Hutu, was shot by Tutsi troops shortly after his inauguration, unleashing ethnic strife that killed more than 200,000 Burundians. All the accused, who are mostly Tutsi, pleaded not guilty. (AP) GUINEA-BISSAU: NEW PRESIDENT SWORN IN -- Malan Bacai Sanha, 52, left, the former head of Parliament, was sworn in, replacing Joao Bernardo Vieira, who remained in hiding in the Portuguese Embassy. The military leaders who ousted him last week demanded that he be handed over for trial. (Reuters)
